changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the snow piles.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
"We're getting close," Leia assures you as you hike up the mountain into the bitter cold. "The facility is at the peak. It will have the clearest signal." 

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText:
Your conversation is interrupted by blaster bolts as Imperial troops strike from ambush. Leia sighs. "It can never just be easy, can it?"

{-} While <color="red">Leia Organa</color> is adjacent to a healthy hero, attacks cannot target her and she cannot suffer {H}.
An avalanche has come down further up the mountain, blocking the way with huge piles of snow and ice.

entityProperties.name: Snow Pile 1
entityProperties.theText:
A snow pile is blocking the way here.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent snow piles. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing a snow pile. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing a snow pile, click "Enter".

entityProperties.name: Snow Pile 2
entityProperties.theText:
A snow pile is blocking the way here.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent snow piles. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing a snow pile. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing a snow pile, click "Enter".

entityProperties.name: Snow Pile 3
entityProperties.theText:
A snow pile is blocking the way here.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent snow piles. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing a snow pile. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing a snow pile, click "Enter".

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent snow piles. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing a snow pile. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing a snow pile, click the snow pile and select "Enter".

"I can see the facility from here," Leia says, pointing up. "We need to get to the main console."

{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters a snow pile.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Leia Organa</color> is defeated.
{-} If the target of an attack is <color="red">Leia Organa</color>, but she cannot be attacked, the attack instead targets the healthy hero closest to <color="red">Leia Organa</color>.

{-} While <color="red">Leia Organa</color> is adjacent to a healthy hero, attacks cannot target her and she cannot suffer {H}.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent snow piles. Rebel figures must spend 4 movement points to enter a space containing a snow pile. Once per activation, a Rebel figure can test {K} to reduce that movement point cost by the number of successes until the end of the activation, to a minimum of 0.
{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters a space containing a snow pile, click "Enter".
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure enters a snow pile.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Leia Organa</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The beacon is installed, and Leia programs the broadcast frequencies. You barricade the facility and blast the remaining Imperials before your pilot returns for an extraction. "You did quite well", Leia says, sounding mildly surprised.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Leia Organa</color> (Rebel Commander) as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Leia is blasted in the arm and falls to the ground. Though she protests, you grab her and retreat to an extraction point. No communication system is worth risking the princess's life.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Support Troops
globalEvents.eventText: Further troops arrive from higher on the mountain, aiming their blasters at you.

globalEvents.name: Wampa Ambush
globalEvents.eventText: Amongst the shouts and blasts of the battle, you hear a roar as a fur-covered monster lumbers toward you, sharp teeth glistening.

globalEvents.name: Almost there
globalEvents.eventText: You fight your way through the snow pile, only to find yourself face to face with more enemies.

eventActions.theText: Behind them, you can see the entrance to the facility, with the main console waiting inside. "There it is," Leia pants.

entityProperties.name: Terminal
entityProperties.theText:
The facilities main console is turned off, waiting to be activated.

{-} <color="red">Leia Organa</color> can interact with the terminal to install the beacon, ending the mission.

eventActions.theText:
{-} <color="red">Leia Organa</color> can interact with the terminal to install the beacon.
{-} The Rebels win when the beacon is installed.
